name: Venturous in the Footsteps of the Fallen
summary: Drawing inspiration from Indianan Jones, Tomb Raider and The Mummy, Venturous is a Doom total conversion mod that follows an Indy-esque adventurer on an epic adventure. It takes place in the 1930’s and sees you on the trail of Nazis who are attempting to unlock the gate to the fabled city of Atlantis. You will explore ancient ruins in Mesoamerica and Egypt while also battling Nazis and mythical monsters.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Venturous - A Superb Indiana Jones Inspired DOOM Total Conversion Mod Where You Hunt For Atlantis!
